original_title: ギ・あいうえおス 他山の石を以って己の玉を磨くべし
overview: Using their sound and film equipment like musical instruments, the members of the band GUI AIUEO:S create an audiovisual work of art. On their journey, they search for UFOs, meet odd hermits, and are introduced to the sustainable toilet.
title: Gui aiueo:S - A stone from another mountain to polish your own
